name: Chen Peleg
aboutMe: Founder of Adam Hevra Veteva school for at-risk youth. Passionate about technology and its ability to improve our lives. Developed technological systems for multiple schools, alongside being a teacher and an educator. In recent years I have been focusing on developing educational games and software to help the students learn better and in more enjoyable and varied ways. After years in the education field I’m interested in a new path as a full-time  software developer.
